The Future of Agriculture Starts Here

Solutions for the acquisition, processing and utilisation of primary agriculture data

Our Mission

Our Solutions

Hardware

Sixty-5 precision agriculture hardware is sourced and designed to enable reliable and simple operation, easy to set up and transfer across machines. Sixty-5 hardware enables a journey of continual technology adoption utilising the evolving suite of software solutions. The initial hardware offering consists of 7" ASUS Android tablet, RAM tablet mounting system, Novatel Ag-Star GPS receiver and Sixty-5 mini data gateway allowing connection to machinery.

Learn More

Software

Software is android based and takes the form of an App that resides on the modern tablets. The current software package connect the mini data gateway and GPS receiver via Bluetooth (R) and enables 3D visualisation of the agricultural operation through an extremely user friendly experience. This experience has been designed to compliments the current working habits of modern farmers.

Learn More

Online Portal

The Sixty-5 online portal will be the central location where soil, treatment, crop, environmental and yield data will be centrally stored and accessed for the precision management of each block of land. All data stored within the portal will be the property of the relevant land owner and will in no circumstances be shared or sold without the owners permission. Aggregated data will be used for the benefit of the wider farming community.

Learn More

Our Vision

We believe the future of agriculture will rest with the provision of hardware, software & data services for better decisions and the real time control of machinery to enable the precision management of each square metre of land.
